definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
to put on weight/to get fat
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5

definition: big-hearted and serene (idiom); contented and easy-going
(coll.) short, fat person (esp. a kid)/a roly-poly
lit. to want to get fat with only one mouthful (proverb)/fig. to try to achieve one's goal in the shortest time possible/to be impatient for success
pinyin: yi1 kou3 chi1 ge5 pang4 zi5

sentences.english: Her teeth were crooked, and she was a little overweight.
sentences.chinese: 她的牙齿长得歪歪扭扭，人也有点胖。

sentences.english: I slept like a fat cat.
sentences.chinese: 你好，我是一只又胖又懒的猫。

sentences.english: Little monkey won the prize. He said push the fattest two out.
sentences.chinese: 小猴子得了奖，他说把最胖的两个人推下去。

sentences.english: You are just a little bit chubby, not paunchy.
sentences.chinese: 只是稍微胖了些，不太胖。

sentences.english: How does schoolgirl menses eat really not fat?
sentences.chinese: 女生月经期真的怎么吃都不胖吗？

sentences.english: Who is the fattest gril student in your class ?
sentences.chinese: 谁是你们班最胖的女生？

sentences.english: Where once he looked roly-poly, he suddenly appeared in public with a normal build.
sentences.chinese: 他以前又矮又胖，却突然以正常体形出现在大家眼前。

sentences.english: I am fat, not wear pants.
sentences.chinese: 我是胖了，裤子就穿不下的人。

sentences.english: How come married women are heavier than single women?
sentences.chinese: 为什么结了婚的女人比单身女人胖呢？

sentences.english: They nicknamed him" Fats" because of his weight.
sentences.chinese: 因为他胖，人们给他取个绰号叫“胖子”。

sentences.english: If you like fat girls then you will like this model.
sentences.chinese: 如果你喜欢胖女孩，那么你会喜欢这种模式。

sentences.english: It's not surprising that these folks weighed more and had larger waists.
sentences.chinese: 这并不稀奇，那些人为什么会超重而且十分胖。

sentences.english: What's the most common mistake women make that makes them look heavy?
sentences.chinese: 女人常犯什么样的错误使她们看起来更胖？

sentences.english: Researchers have found a number of ways that fat people could influence their pals' girth.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员已经发现了胖人们影响朋友腰围的种种途径。

sentences.english: One fat woman of them see a black skirt with white dot.
sentences.chinese: 她们中一个较胖的妇女看见一条黑底带白点裙子。
在新加坡有喜欢胖的么？

definition: thin/to lose weight/(of clothing) tight/(of meat) lean/(of land) unproductive
to put on weight/to get fat
fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure
big-hearted and serene (idiom); contented and easy-going
clown/2nd earthly branch: 1-3 a.m., 12th solar month (6th January to 3rd February), year of the Ox/ancient Chinese compass point: 30°
to put on weight/to get fat (a sign of prosperity, so a compliment)
